title: The Developers Guide to GenAI
text:
🎮 Pick Your LLM!

  

    
    
      
        🔄 I/O Capabilities
      
      
        
          📥
          Input modalities: text, image, audio, voice
        
        
          📝
          Output modalities: text, image, voice
        
        
          🌍
          Multilingual capabilities
        
      
    

    
    
      
        ⚙️ Technical Features
      
      
        
          🧠
          Reasoning
        
        
          🛠
          Tool Calling
        
        
          🔢
          Structured Output
        
      
    

    
    
      
        📊 Practical Factors
      
      
        
          📏
          Maximum context window size
        
        
          💰
          Price per token (input/output)
        
        
          ⚡
          Response generation speed

title: The Developers Guide to GenAI
text:
Biggest Challenge: Specificity

    
      
        ⚠️
      

      
        
          GenAI will fail when given tasks that are:
        
        
          
            ✘ Too complex without breakdown
          
          
            ✘ Ambiguous in requirements
          
          
            ✓ Break down complex tasks
          
          
            ✓ Be specific in instructions
          
        
      
    

    
      
        "The quality of your output is directly proportional to the specificity of your input."

title: The Developers Guide to GenAI

Thank You!

  
  
    
      Let's Connect
    
    
      
        •
        Connect with me on LinkedIn

        Discuss implementation strategies
      
    
  

  
  
    Questions?
    
      
  
    Scan to connect
  






Be ready for technical questions about the GenAI stack, tools, and implementation patterns
Consider preparing additional examples for specific use cases
Have resources ready to share with attendees
Collect contact information for follow-up conversations
